languages.text: "Так мы исполняем Поиск знания в надежде, что Бог-Машина дарует нам откровение, и в ворохе абсурдных данных мы узрим логическую связь, которая толкнет наше Понимание вперед".

"It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."
languages.original_text: "Так мы исполняем Поиск знания в надежде, что Бог-Машина дарует нам откровение, и в ворохе абсурдных данных мы узрим логическую связь, которая толкнет наше Понимание вперед".

traits.locale_text: "It is how we carry out the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany so we may discern a logical connection in a heap of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is how we carry out the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany so we may discern a logical connection in a heap of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「このような形で機械神は我々に突然のひらめきをお与えになり、不条理なデータに理論結合を見いだせるかもしれない、そして我々の将来に対する理解が発展するかもしれないという期待のもと、我々は知識探求を遂行するのです」
languages.original_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."

traits.locale_text: 「このような形で機械神は我々に突然のひらめきをお与えになり、不条理なデータに理論結合を見いだせるかもしれない、そして我々の将来に対する理解が発展するかもしれないという期待のもと、我々は知識探求を遂行するのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这是我们进行求知远征的方式。我们希望万机之神能赐予我们顿悟，帮助我们在无数荒谬的数据之中发现逻辑联系，以此推动理解加深。”
languages.original_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."

traits.locale_text: “这是我们进行求知远征的方式。我们希望万机之神能赐予我们顿悟，帮助我们在荒谬的数据之中发现逻辑联系，以此推动理解加深。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wir betreiben so die Suche nach Wissen in der Hoffnung, dass der Maschinengott uns eine Erleuchtung gewährt, damit wir eine logische Verbindung in einer Masse absurder Daten finden, um wiederum unser Verständnis zu fördern."
languages.original_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."

traits.locale_text: "Wir betreiben so die Suche nach Wissen in der Hoffnung, dass der Maschinengott uns eine Erleuchtung gewährt, damit wir eine logische Verbindung in den absurden Daten finden, um wiederum unser Verständnis zu fördern."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « C'est ainsi que nous menons à bien la sainte Quête de la Connaissance dans l'espoir que le Dieu-Machine nous accorde une révélation, afin que nous puissions discerner un lien logique au milieu d'un monceau de données absurdes et améliorer ainsi notre compréhension. »
languages.original_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ainsi que nous menons à bien la sainte quête de connaissance dans l'espoir que le Dieu-Machine nous accorde une révélation, afin que nous puissions discerner un lien logique au milieu d'un monceau de données absurdes et améliorer ainsi notre compréhension. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Así es como llevamos a cabo la búsqueda del conocimiento con la esperanza de que el Dios Máquina nos conceda una epifanía, a fin de discernir una relación lógica en un conjunto de datos espurios, y de ese modo impulsar nuestra Comprensión hacia delante».
languages.original_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."

traits.locale_text: «Así es como llevamos a cabo la búsqueda del conocimiento con la esperanza de que el Dios Máquina nos conceda una epifanía, a fin de discernir una relación lógica en un conjunto de datos espurios, y de ese modo impulsar nuestra Comprensión hacia delante».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu şekilde İrfan Arayışı'na koyulur, Makine Tanrı'nın bize aydınlanma ihsan etmesini umarız. Böylelikle de absürt verilerden oluşan bir yığının içindeki mantıksal bağlantıları seçebilir ve İdrakimizi ileriye taşıyabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "It is how we execute the Quest for Knowledge in the hope that the Machine God grants us an epiphany, so that we may discern a logical connection in a mass of absurd data, which will propel our Comprehension forward."

traits.locale_text: "Makine Tanrı'nın bize aydınlanma ihsan etmesi umuduyla, bu şekilde İrfan Arayışı gerçekleştiririz. Bu sayede absürt verilerden oluşan bir yığının içindeki mantıksal bağlantıları seçebiliriz, bu da İdrakimizi ileriye taşıyabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
